INSERT INTO video ( video_code, video_file_path, professor_id, video_name, video_stored_name, video_play_time, video_reg_date, video_extension ) VALUES ( 'V'||LPAD(TO_CHAR(video_seq.NEXTVAL), 5, '0'), #{videoFilePath}, #{professorId}, #{videoName}, #{videoStoredName}, #{videoPlayTime}, SYSDATE, #{videoExtension} )

INSERT INTO lecture ( lecture_code, week_code, lecture_reg_date, lecture_start_date, lecture_end_date, lecture_att_time, lecture_content, video_code, lecture_title, course_code ) VALUES ( SUBSTR(#{weekCode}, 3, 2)||'L'||LPAD(TO_CHAR(lecture_seq.NEXTVAL), 7, '0'), #{weekCode}, SYSDATE, #{lectureStartDate}, #{lectureEndDate}, #{lectureAttTime} * 60, #{lectureContent}, #{videoCode}, #{lectureTitle}, #{courseCode})
mapper.update: UPDATE lecture SET week_code = #{weekCode}, lecture_att_time = #{lectureAttTime} * 60, lecture_title = #{lectureTitle}, lecture_content = #{lectureContent}, lecture_start_date = #{lectureStartDate}, lecture_end_date = #{lectureEndDate}, video_code = #{videoCode} WHERE lecture_code = #{lectureCode}
